description: Ben is a member of Bound Gods. He fills out a model application and flies across the country for this. He's one of the very few members who take the plunge. Sure, some went as far as the day prior to the shoot and "things" come up at the last minute. "Sorry, I can not make it. My aunt just passed away." No, not Ben. He's going all the way. Though he has never done any bondage prior, he's willing to give it a try. This is his first time being on camera.
title: Ben
